text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: What seems to be the trouble?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The trouble seems to be this! It seems
that my uniform can no longer withstand
my extraordinary excellence!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The cause can be determined to be
weight gain. Estimating from the most
recent calorie intake and the speed of
movement――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
N-no, no! It's out of the standard, so
it can't be calculated!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You are incorrect. The change in 
the numbers proves it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If our stories cannot reach an
agreement… then let's race to decide!
The winner's theory is the right one,
that is all!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Numerical changes due to exercise are 
presumed to be validation… Order 
approved. Moving to verification phase.

Thus, the game between the two was
played out over several days…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There's Ms. Bourbon! Let's decide 
who wins today!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
――End of verification……Weight loss
should have relieved the pressure of
the uniform.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Now that you mention it, that seems
to be the case. While I've been running
for the past few days, the scale's been
reading……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hah! I see, the uniform has grown to 
acommodate me! Could it have been 
inspired by my running!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In other words……I was right after all!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
……… 
…No, I do not think you were.

At any rate, that's how Sakura Bakushin
O succeeded in losing weight!
